snippet.title: Planet of Lana - Official Trailer | The Game Awards 2021
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: bit.ly/PlanetOfLana
A young girl and her loyal friend embark on a rescue mission through a colorful world full of cold machines and unfamiliar creatures. Planet of Lana is a puzzle adventure game framed by an epic sci-fi saga that stretches across centuries and galaxies.
